dt: {bc}a ball with a forward and spinning motion
{bc}a tornado, waterspout, or dust devil in which the rotatory ascending movement of a column of air is especially apparent

shortdef: one that twists; especially : a ball with a forward and spinning motion
a tornado, waterspout, or dust devil in which the rotatory ascending movement of a column of air is especially apparent

dt: {bc}a word, phrase, or sentence difficult to articulate because of a succession of similar consonantal sounds (as in "twin-screw steel cruiser")

shortdef: a word, phrase, or sentence difficult to articulate because of a succession of similar consonantal sounds (as in "twin-screw steel cruiser")
